title: Shoshana Zuboff, "The Age of Surveillance Capitalism"
description:
Shoshana Zuboff, author of The Age of Surveillance Capitalism, talked about the growing business of collecting and selling consumer data. She was interviewed by Nilay Patel, editor-in-chief of The Verge.
